title: Acadia National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 44 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Acadia National Park Baker Island Cruise      Location: Harbor Place, 1 West Street, Bar Harbor Fees: $46 adults, $27 children 6-14, $9 children 5 and under     Friday, August 5, 2016 Spot seabirds and marine mammals on a cruise along coastal Acadia. Explore beautiful Baker Island on a moderate hike, viewing historic homesteads, a lighthouse, and geology. View Details      Acadia National Park Bike with a Ranger      Time: 4:30 PM to 6:30 PM Location: reservations required 207-288-8832     Friday, August 5, 2016 Explore carriage roads on this 8-11 mile (13-18 km) ride at a comfortable pace. For adults and children 12+. Bring your own bike (rentals available in local communities), water, snack/lunch, and helmet. View Details      Acadia National Park Chat with a Ranger      Time: 2:00 PM to 2:45 PM Location: Fabbri Picnic area     Friday, August 5, 2016 Learn more about current park issues and join in the conversation. We want to hear your voice. View Details      Acadia National Park Focus on Acadia      Time: 7:30 AM to 9:30 AM Location: reservations required 207-288-8832     Friday, August 5, 2016 Bring your camera and learn valuable tips and techniques to capture our beauty. May include travel to various points on this easy walk/drive. View Details      Acadia National Park Island Walk      Location: Reservations required: 207-288-8832     Friday, August 5, 2016 Learn about one of the unique aspects of this island park, on this 2-mile (3.2-km) easy to moderate walk. View Details      Acadia National Park Islesford Historic & Scenic Cruise      Time: 10:00 AM to 12:45 PM Location: Municipal Pier, Northeast Harbor Fees: $29 adults, $27 seniors (65+), $18 ages 5-11, $7 ages under 5, infants free     Friday, August 5, 2016 Explore the connections between people and the sea with a visit to the Islesford Historical Museum on Little Cranberry Island. Along the way, look for wildlife and explore Somes Sound. View Details      Acadia National Park Kids Rock!      Time: 4:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: Fabbri Picnic area     Friday, August 5, 2016 From 4-5 pm, drop in to see an touch different rocks, minerals, soils, and other examples of Acadia's geologic story. View Details      Acadia National Park Missing Mansion      Time: 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM Location: reservations required: 207-288-8832     Friday, August 5, 2016 Explore the site of George Dorr's former mansion on this easy walk. Look for clues and learn about the man who helped create our national park. View Details      Acadia National Park Seawall Evening Program      Time: 8:30 PM to 9:30 PM Location: Seawall Campground Amphitheater     Friday, August 5, 2016 Check campground bulletin boards or visitor centers for a complete list of program topics. Parking area near the amphitheater accommodates non-campers. View Details      Acadia National Park Stars Over Sand Beach      Time: 9:00 PM to 10:00 PM Location: Sand Beach     Friday, August 5, 2016 Lay back and learn about the amazing night sky. Dress warmly, bring something to lay on, and please minimize flashlight use to preserve night vision. View Details      Acadia National Park Touch Tank      Time: 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Dorr Museum of Natural History, College of the Atlantic     Friday, August 5, 2016 Anytime between 1-3 pm get up close and personal with intertidal creatures and learn how to safely explore along the shore. Family program. View Details      Acadia National Park Walk on the Wild Side      Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM Location: reservations required: 207-288-8832     Friday, August 5, 2016 Explore Acadia's forests, streams, meadows, or mountains. Wear closed-toe, non-skid shoes. Difficulty level and age requirements vary. Inquire when making reservations. View Details      Acadia National Park Welcoming Sunrise      Location: unmarked parking area beyond Gorham Mountain parking area, look for orange cones     Friday, August 5, 2016 After welcoming sunrise, join in an optional stroll or talk with the ranger. Topics vary. Program begins 20 minutes before sunrise. View Details      Acadia National Park Acadia Adventure      Time: 4:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: reservations required: 207-288-8832     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Get outside, connect with nature, and explore Acadia! May include a short walk, activity, or demonstration. Intended for ages 7 and older. View Details      Acadia National Park Acadia's Birds      Time: 7:00 AM to 9:00 AM Location: varies Fees: reservations required: 207-288-8832     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Find, identify, and discuss some of Acadia’s most fascinating birds on this easy walk. Bring binoculars. View Details      Acadia National Park Beech Mountain Hike      Time: 9:30 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Beech Mountain parking area     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Uncover the wilds while hiking through lichen-draped forests and steep, rocky outcrops on this moderate to strenuous 2.5-mile (4 km) hike. View Details      Acadia National Park Blackwoods Evening Program      Time: 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM Location: Blackwoods Campground Amphitheater     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Check campground bulletin boards or visitor centers for a complete list of program topics. Parking area near the amphitheater accommodates non-campers. View Details      Acadia National Park Coffee with a Ranger      Time: 8:00 AM to 9:00 AM Location: Sieur de Monts Nature Center     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Bring your favorite morning beverage and join a discussion about Acadia's 21st century changes and challenges. View Details      Acadia National Park Fire Tower Open House      Time: 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Beech Mountain summit     Saturday, August 6, 2016 Hike up one of several trails leading to the summit of Beech Mountain. Enjoy the views from the staffed fire tower at the top. View Details      Acadia National Park Blackwoods Evening Program      Time: 8:30 PM to 9:30 PM Location: Blackwoods Campground Amphitheater     Sunday, August 7, 2016 Check campground bulletin boards or visitor centers for a complete list of program topics. Parking area near the amphitheater accommodates non-campers. View Details      Acadia National Park Island Walk      Time: 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM Location: Reservations required: 207-288-8832     Sunday, August 7, 2016 Learn about one of the unique aspects of this island park, on this 2-mile (3.2-km) easy to moderate walk. View Details      Acadia National Park Peregrine Watch      Time: 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Precipice Trail parking area     Sunday, August 7, 2016 Stop by between 9 am and noon to observe a peregrine falcon nest on the cliffs of Champlain Mountain through viewing scopes, weather permitting. View Details      Acadia National Park Photo Safari      Time: 4:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: reservations required: 207-288-8832     Sunday, August 7, 2016 Join a ranger to explore the interesting world around us through a camera lens. Bring your digital camera, cell phone, or tablet. Family program. View Details      Acadia National Park As Cultures Come Together      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Fabbri Picnic area     Monday, August 8, 2016 Hear the story of the meeting of the French explorers in the 17th century, whose names are found in the park, and the Wabanaki, who have inhabited this area for thousands of years. How are they still a part of the story today? View Details      Acadia National Park Headland Hike      Time: 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Sand Beach parking area     Monday, August 8, 2016 Learn how to read the geologic and cultural story in Acadia's dramatic landscape on this moderate, rocky 2-mile (3.2 km) hike. View Details      Acadia National Park Shoreline Clean-up      Time: 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Frazer Point Picnic Area     Monday, August 8, 2016 Please join us for our monthly shoreline clean-ups at Schoodic this summer! View Details      Acadia National Park Super Sand Sleuths      Time: 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Sand Beach     Monday, August 8, 2016 Explore all the things that make this sandy beach unique. Family program. View Details      Acadia National Park Carroll Homestead Open House      Time: 11:30 AM to 2:30 PM Location: Carroll Homestead     Tuesday, August 9, 2016 Between 11:30 am and 2:30 pm visit an 1800s farm home, hear family stories, and play pioneer games. Imagine what life was like for the generations who lived here. Family program. View Details      Acadia National Park Chat with a Ranger      Time: 1:00 PM to 1:45 PM Location: Fabbri Picnic area     Tuesday, August 9, 2016 Learn more about current park issues and join in the conversation. We want to hear your voice. View Details      Acadia National Park Knowing the Night      Location: reservations required 207-288-8832     Tuesday, August 9, 2016 Challenge your senses and experience the mystery of Acadia after dark. For adults and children 8+. Times vary. Call 207-288-8832. View Details      Acadia National Park Mr. Rockefeller's Bridges      Time: 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Parkman Mountain parking area     Tuesday, August 9, 2016 Follow tree-lined carriage roads to beautiful stone bridges. Explore the stories behind John D. Rockefeller Jr.'s gift to Acadia on this easy 1.5-mile (2.4 km) walk. View Details      Acadia National Park Seawall Evening Program      Time: 9:00 PM to 10:00 PM Location: Seawall Campground Amphitheater     Tuesday, August 9, 2016 Check campground bulletin boards or visitor centers for a complete list of program topics. Parking area near the amphitheater accommodates non-campers. View Details      Acadia National Park Wild Acadia Project!      Time: 4:30 PM to 5:30 PM Location: Sieur de Monts Nature Center     Tuesday, August 9, 2016 Share your thoughts as we explore how park managers are working to make the Heart of Acadia a healthier place. View Details      Acadia National Park Cultural Connections: Hawk Henries      Time: 6:30 PM to 8:15 PM Location: Blackwoods Campground Amphitheater     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Hawk Henries, Nipmuck, Storytelling and music. Drop in; demonstrations and performances. For rain location: 207-288-3519 View Details      Acadia National Park Fire Tower Open House      Time: 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Beech Mountain Summit     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Enjoy the views from Beech Mountain Fire Tower. Hike from parking lot at the southern end of Beech Hill Road. View Details      Acadia National Park Le Reve de Rockefeller      Time: 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Parkman Mountain parking area     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Ces chemins, les “carriage roads” qui pénètrent les forêts et les montagnes du parc national sont le don et le rêve de John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Découvrez les ponts en granit et les belles vues. Rendez-vous au stationnement du Mont Parkman, mercredi à 9h. View Details      Acadia National Park La Rencontre de Deux Mondes      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: Fabbri Picnic area     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Ecoutez l'histoire de la rencontre des explorateurs français du 17ième siècle dont les noms se trouvent toujours dans le parc et les Wabanaki, habitants de cette région depuis des milliers d'années. View Details      Acadia National Park Power Walk      Time: 7:00 AM to 7:45 AM Location: Jordan Pond House parking area     Thursday, August 11, 2016 Avoid the crowds and experience our cool morning beauty on this 2-3-mile (3.2-4.8-km) energetic walk. View Details      Acadia National Park Sur la Cote Rocheuse      Time: 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Gorham Mountain parking area     Thursday, August 11, 2016 2 heures; facile; randonnée guidée; 3 km Faisons une promenade sur la partie de la côte la plus pittoresque du parc. Rendez-vous au stationnement du Mont Gorham, jeudi à 10h. View Details      Acadia National Park Cultural Connections: Penobscot Theater Company      Time: 3:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Blackwoods Campground Amphitheater     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Penobscot Theater Company. Drop in; demonstrations and performances. For rain location: 207-288-3519 View Details      Acadia National Park Blackwoods Evening Program      Time: 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Blackwoods Campground Amphitheater     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Check campground bulletin boards or visitor centers for a complete list of program topics. Parking area near the amphitheater accommodates non-campers. View Details      Acadia National Park Stars Over Sand Beach      Time: 8:30 PM to 9:30 PM Location: Sand Beach     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Sit back and learn about Acadia's amazing night sky. Dress warmly, bring something to lay on, and please minimize flashlight use to preserve night vision. View Details      Acadia National Park Seawall Evening Program      Time: 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM Location: Seawall Campground Amphitheater     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Check campground bulletin boards or visitor centers for a complete list of program topics. Parking area near the amphitheater accommodates non-campers. View Details      Acadia National Park The Gift of Acadia      Time: 8:30 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Jordan Pond House, parking at MDI High School Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join national leaders, park staff, and Acadia partners at Jordan Pond from 8:30 am to 10 am celebrating the co-centennial of the National Park Service and Acadia National Park.  View Details
